questions.text: What is the name of the coffee shop in Friends?
Which movie won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020?
What is Baby Yoda's real name in The Mandalorian?
In The Matrix, what color pill does Neo take?
What is the highest-grossing film of all time (not adjusted for inflation)?
Which actor played Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
What year did the first episode of The Simpsons air?
In Breaking Bad, what is Walter White's alias?
Which film features the quote 'Here's looking at you, kid'?
How many seasons did Game of Thrones run for?
What is the name of the island in Jurassic Park?
Which actress played Eleven in Stranger Things?
In The Office (US), what is Michael Scott's favorite quote?
What is the name of the kingdom in Frozen?
Which director is known for films like Inception, Interstellar, and The Dark Knight?
What Netflix series features a chess prodigy named Beth Harmon?
In Harry Potter, what platform do students use to catch the Hogwarts Express?
Which actor voices Woody in the Toy Story franchise?
Which artist has won the most Grammy Awards of all time?
What was the name of Nirvana's breakthrough 1991 album?
Which female artist released the album 'Lemonade' in 2016?
What is Eminem's real name?
questions.answer: Marshall Bruce Mathers III (or Marshall Mathers)

questions.text: Which band sang 'Bohemian Rhapsody'?
What year did Michael Jackson release 'Thriller'?
Which K-pop group has a song called 'Dynamite'?

What is the best-selling album of all time?

What year did Elvis Presley die?
Which Spice Girl was known as 'Posh Spice'?
What does AC/DC stand for in the band's name?
Which artist holds the record for most Billboard Hot 100 number-one singles?
What was the first music video played on MTV?
questions.answer: Video Killed the Radio Star by The Buggles

What was the name of Destiny's Child's breakout hit in 1999?
questions.answer: Say My Name (or Bills, Bills, Bills)
